file.name: sp_classifier_spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: kearch specialist search engine classifier API
  description: kearch specialist search engine classifier API
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: '{scheme}://{sp_host}:{port}/sp/classifier'
    variables:
      scheme:
        enum:
          - http
          - https
        default: http
      sp_host:
        default: sp-classifier.kearch.svc.cluster.local
      port:
        default: '10080'
paths:
  /classify:
    post:
      requestBody:
        description: A connection request.
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                body_words:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: string
                title_words:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: integer
